title.narrative: Support to International Energy Agency (IEA): Energy Efficiency in Emerging Economies (E4) Phase II

description.narrative: GHG emissions reduced through increased use and uptake of improved energy efficiency data, models, enabling framework conditions and best-practice policies for advancing energy efficiency improvements
